title: EastEnders' Stacey Slater returns tonight
text:
Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Stacey Slater will finally return to EastEnders tonight - but her whole world will be rocked when Martin Fowler makes a shock confession.

The pair meet up in secret in a hotel room and her initial excitement turns to dismay when she sees the state Martin is in.

After she confronts him about the wounds on his face, Martin tells her something that leaves her utterly devastated.

As a result, she smacks him around the face... is their marriage completely in tatters now?

Actress Lacey Turner was last seen in Walford back in August to go on maternity leave and give birth to baby daughter Dusty Violet with husband Matt Kay.

(Image: BBC / Kieron McCarron)

(Image: BBC / Kieron McCarron)

She gave birth a month before her final scenes aired but is returning briefly tonight after Ben Mitchell's dark threat.

Ben threatened to kill Stacey and their kids if they don't stay away and so Martin secretly meets his wife at a hotel.

In contrast to the Mitchell family drama, 31-year-old Lacey is enjoying time off with her daughter, who she gave birth to after tragically suffering two miscarriages.

(Image: BBC)

Speaking about the reason she chose her daughter's name, she told OK! Magazine: "It wasn't on our original list but we did an internet search for 'pretty girls' names and we both said it at the same time!

"Her middle name is Violet, which I also love.

"We've had mixed reactions, people either think it's really cool or they don't really know what to say!"

Matt added: "The only other Dusty I know is Dusty Springfield. We do like Dusty Springfield but she wasn't named after her!"

*EastEnders airs tonight at 8pm on BBC One
description: Actress Lacey Turner is back after leaving for maternity leave earlier this summer
